TAKE YOUR
LAB FROM
TRADITIONAL
TO DIGITAL

Creating labs of the future
with the world's #1
lab management software.

GET EVIDENT
YOU'RE IN
GOOD COMPANY
600+
Labs
60,000+
Dentists
15 Million+
Patient Rx's
$1.5 Billion
In Prosthetics

Evident has reduced the stress for my technicians
so they can focus on the work in front of
them.
Plus, the awesome cloud-based centralization has
allowed me to run multiple sites
seamlessly.
Evident has truly unleashed the potential of our
lab and team!

Steve Campbell

Having the right people and the right tools have
been critical elements in achieving our goals at
Watersedge. A special thank you goes to the
wonderful team at Evident for working closely
with
us
on one of our most important tools...the
software platform that helps us manage this
juggernaut!
You guys are fantastic!

Rob Waters

Evident has changed the way we work for the
better. The flexibility, tools and support evident
provides every single time, enables us to go
beyond what we have done in the past and focus
on
growing our business.

Alaa Abou Hassan

We love Evident! This program makes all the
difference with our day-to-day work flow. It’s
efficient,
organized and easy to use. We have
worked closely with the staff who are always
there
to help
and tailor the program to our
specific needs. Evident is one thing we never
have to worry
about,
which allows us to focus on
our customers and their needs. We highly
recommend it!

Jaymen Hong

Evident is so much more than a laboratory
operating system. It gives me vision on specific
data
to
help me make informed decisions and it
gives me the power to view the laboratory on a
micro
and
macro level from all my custom report

Brent West

Apex Lab Group utilizes Evident Software as a
complete production software solution in 10
lab
locations. Evident software continues
to evolve
with our growing lab business, adding
new
features, and opportunities to customize
solutions to fit our lab’s needs. Evident
customer
support is accessible and in our experience has
great follow through. Thanks
Evident Team!

Kay Hayden

1
2
3

OUR SOFTWARE
PACKAGES TACKLE
THE MOST COMMON
CHALLENGES
FACING
DENTAL LABS TODAY

Let our decades of lab management
expertise
guide you into
the digital lab
world.

1

Managing Your
Lab Better

  • Higher quality control with
    automated reporting.
  • Increased productivity through better
    labour management.
  • Greater profitability with expert
    business templates.
  • Continuing education.
  • Numerous milling and design
    outsourcing partners.
  • Access to evident's buying power
    with savings up to 30%.
2

Keeping
Customers Happy

  • Create loyalty & get paid faster with
    our online doctor portal.
  • Reduce security risks with our
    HIPAA compliant cyber security.
  • Connect automatically with dental
    practice management systems.
  • Experience seamless program
    integration for better business &
    lab
    management.
3

Getting New
Customers

  • Expert social media training from
    industry professionals.
  • Increased brand awareness through
    email marketing campaigns.
  • Better customer retention with
    automated reporting and updates.
  • Free advertising and marketing on
    the evident platform.

I WANT TO
IMPROVE MY LAB

DISCOVER HOW

EVERYTHING
YOU NEED
UNDER ONE ROOF
